thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: judy brazenall
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by judy brazenall

author: judy brazenall
title: judy brazenall
text: My husband is in a nursing home with advanced parkinson disease and he has found the Kisa phone very easy to operate. We like all the different options which Kisa was able to set particularly to our needs. We have been very very happy that we are able to contact each other at any time and that Kisa were able to help very quickly to our needs. Thank you Kisa.
